languages.text: "К счастью, я готовился к такому еще со времен первого покушения этой стервы на Футфол. Тогда вы нас защитили и дали мне время принять меры. Я организовал схроны с оружием, привлек больше бойцов, удалил из когитаторной сети данные о своих агентах. Взяв власть, Чорда думала, что победила, но станция по прежнему оставалась моей... в какой-то мере".

"Fortunately, I'd been preparing for that turn of events ever since that hag tried to take Footfall the first time. You helped us then, giving me time to organise. I set up weapons caches, enlisted more fighters, and deleted my agents' data from the cogitator network. When Chorda seized power, she thought she'd won, but the station was still mine... to an extent."
languages.original_text: "К счастью, я готовился к такому еще со времен первого покушения этой стервы на Футфол. Тогда вы нас защитили и дали мне время принять меры. Я организовал схроны с оружием, привлек больше бойцов, удалил из когитаторной сети данные о своих агентах. Взяв власть, Чорда думала, что победила, но станция по прежнему оставалась моей... в какой-то мере".

When Chorda took power, she thought she'd won, but the station was still mine... to an extent."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: “但好消息是，自从那个老妖婆第一次打算夺走落脚港时，我就已经做好了准备。您当时协助了我们，给我们争取了足够的时间组织起来。我充实了武器库，招募了更多战士，还从沉思者网络中删除了我所有代理人的数据。当库尔达掌权的时候，她以为她已经赢了。然而，从某种程度上而言，这座星站依然属于我……”
languages.original_text: "Fortunately, I'd been preparing for that turn of events ever since that hag tried to take Footfall the first time. You helped us then, giving me time to organise. I set up weapons caches, enlisted more fighters, and deleted my agents' data from the cogitator network. When Chorda seized power, she thought she'd won, but the station was still mine... to an extent."

traits.locale_text: “但好消息是，自从那个老妖婆第一次打算夺走落脚港时，我就已经做好了准备。您当时协助了我们，当我们有足够的时间组织起来。我充实了武器库，招募了更多战士，还从思考器网络中删除了我所有代理人的数据。当库尔达掌权的时候，她以为她已经赢了。然而，从某种程度上而言，这座星站依然属于我……”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: 「幸いなことに、ずっとこの時を待っていた。あのババアが初めてフットフォールを奪おうとした時からな。あの時は、お前が助けてくれたおかげで準備する時間ができた。武器庫を設置し、戦士を増員し、考算機ネットワークからエージェントのデータを削除した。チョーダは権力を握って完全勝利したと思い込んでいる様だが、ステーションはまだ私のものだ…まぁ、一部だけだが」
languages.original_text: "Fortunately, I'd been preparing for that turn of events ever since that hag tried to take Footfall the first time. You helped us then, giving me time to organise. I set up weapons caches, enlisted more fighters, and deleted my agents' data from the cogitator network. When Chorda seized power, she thought she'd won, but the station was still mine... to an extent."

traits.locale_text: 「幸いなことに、ずっとこの時を待っていた。あのババアが初めてフットフォールを奪おうとした時からな。あの時は、お前が助けてくれたおかげで準備する時間ができた。武器庫を設置し、戦士を増員し、考算機ネットワークからエージェントのデータを削除した。チョーダは権力を握って完全勝利したと思い込んでいる様だが、ステーションはまだ私のものだ…まぁ、一部だけだが」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: «Afortunadamente, me había estado preparando para ese giro de los acontecimientos desde la primera vez que esa bruja intentó apoderarse de Paso. Entonces nos ayudó, dándome tiempo para organizarme. Preparé depósitos de armas, recluté más combatientes y borré los datos de mis agentes de la red del cogitador. Cuando Chorda se hizo con el poder, pensó que había ganado, pero la estación seguía siendo mía... hasta cierto punto».
languages.original_text: "Fortunately, I'd been preparing for that turn of events ever since that hag tried to take Footfall the first time. You helped us then, giving me time to organise. I set up weapons caches, enlisted more fighters, and deleted my agents' data from the cogitator network. When Chorda seized power, she thought she'd won, but the station was still mine... to an extent."

traits.locale_text: «Afortunadamente, me había estado preparando para ese giro de los acontecimientos desde la primera vez que esa bruja intentó apoderarse de Paso.Entonces nos ayudó, dándome tiempo para organizarme. Preparé depósitos de armas, recluté más combatientes y borré los datos de mis agentes de la red del cogitador. Cuando Chorda se hizo con el poder, pensó que había ganado, pero la estación seguía siendo mía... hasta cierto punto».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Glücklicherweise war ich auf diese Wendung der Ereignisse vorbereitet, seit diese alte Hexe das erste Mal versucht hat, Footfall zu erobern. Ihr habt uns damals geholfen, habt uns die Zeit verschafft, uns zu organisieren. Ich habe Waffenlager eingerichtet, weitere Kämpfer rekrutiert und die Daten meiner Agenten aus dem Cogitator-Netzwerk gelöscht. Als Chorda die Macht übernommen hat, dachte sie, sie hätte gewonnen, doch die Station war noch immer mein ... teilweise."
languages.original_text: "Fortunately, I'd been preparing for that turn of events ever since that hag tried to take Footfall the first time. You helped us then, giving me time to organise. I set up weapons caches, enlisted more fighters, and deleted my agents' data from the cogitator network. When Chorda seized power, she thought she'd won, but the station was still mine... to an extent."

traits.locale_text: "Glücklicherweise war ich auf diese Wendung der Ereignisse vorbereitet, seit diese alte Hexe das erste Mal versucht hat, Footfall zu erobern. Ihr habt uns damals geholfen, habt uns die Zeit verschafft, uns zu organisieren. Ich habe Waffenlager eingerichtet, weitere Kämpfer rekrutiert und die Daten meiner Agenten aus dem Cogitator-Netzwerk gelöscht. Als Chorda die Macht übernommen hat, dachte sie, sie hätte gewonnen, doch die Station war noch immer mein ... teilweise."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: « Heureusement, je me suis préparé à cette éventualité depuis la première fois que cette harpie a essayé de s'emparer de Castel. Vous nous avez apporté votre aide à ce moment, ce qui m'a donné le temps de m'organiser. J'ai caché des armes, enrôlé plus de combattants et supprimé les données concernant mes agents du réseau de cogitateurs. Quand Chorda a pris le pouvoir, elle a cru avoir gagné, mais la station est encore à moi... dans une certaine mesure. »
languages.original_text: "Fortunately, I'd been preparing for that turn of events ever since that hag tried to take Footfall the first time. You helped us then, giving me time to organise. I set up weapons caches, enlisted more fighters, and deleted my agents' data from the cogitator network. When Chorda seized power, she thought she'd won, but the station was still mine... to an extent."

traits.locale_text: « Heureusement, je me suis préparé à cette éventualité depuis la première fois que cette harpie a essayé de s'emparer de Castel. Vous nous avez apporté votre aide à ce moment, ce qui m'a donné le temps de m'organiser. J'ai caché des armes, enrôlé plus de combattants et supprimé les données concernant mes agents du réseau de cogitateurs. Quand Chorda a pris le pouvoir, elle a cru avoir gagné, mais la station est encore à moi... dans une certaine mesure. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Neyse ki o cadı pis ellerini Binliman'a ilk uzattığından beri tertip hâlindeydim. O gün bize yardım ederek hazırlık yapmam için vakit kazandırmıştınız. Silah zulalayıp saflarımızı güçlendirdim, casuslarımın kavramsayar ağına kaydettiği verileri silebildim. Chorda başa geçtiğinde kazandığını sansa da istasyon hâlâ benimdi... Yani bir yere kadar."
languages.original_text: "Fortunately, I'd been preparing for that turn of events ever since that hag tried to take Footfall the first time. You helped us then, giving me time to organise. I set up weapons caches, enlisted more fighters, and deleted my agents' data from the cogitator network. When Chorda seized power, she thought she'd won, but the station was still mine... to an extent."

traits.locale_text: "Neyse ki o cadı pis ellerini Binliman'a ilk uzattığından beri tertip hâlindeydim. O gün bize yardım ederek hazırlık yapmam için vakit kazandırmıştınız. Silah zulalayıp saflarımızı güçlendirmiş, casuslarımın kavramsayar ağına kaydettiği verileri silebilmiştim. Chorda başa geçtiğinde kazandığını sanmıştı ama istasyon hâlâ benimdi... Yani bir yere kadar."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04
